fields.plot: An aging, booze-addled father makes the trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim a million dollar Mega Sweepstakes Marketing prize.
fields.title: Nebraska

fields.plot: An overgrown nerd who serves as Grand Master of a fantasy board game finds his role as leader of the misfits put into jeopardy when a new initiate enters the group.
fields.title: Zero Charisma

fields.plot: The story of a con artist and his partner in crime, who were forced to work with a federal agent to turn the tables on other cons, mobsters, and politicians - namely, the volatile mayor of impoverished Camden, New Jersey.
fields.title: American Hustle

fields.plot: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.
fields.title: Back to the Future

fields.plot: A pair of childhood friends and neighbors fall for each other's sons.
fields.title: Adore

fields.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island individuals are shattered when their addictions become stronger.
fields.title: Requiem for a Dream

fields.plot: A look at the relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University -- when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.
fields.title: Monsters University

fields.plot: A recounting of the chaotic events that occurred at Dallas' Parkland Hospital on the day U.S. President John F. Kennedy was assassinated.
fields.title: Parkland

fields.plot: An average Joe meets the perfect woman, but his lack of confidence and the influence of his friends and family begin to pick away at the relationship.
fields.title: She's Out of My League

fields.plot: Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation for his daughter's attractive friend.
fields.title: American Beauty

fields.plot: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.
fields.title: Homefront

fields.plot: A male stripper teaches a younger performer how to party, pick up women, and make easy money.
fields.title: Magic Mike

fields.plot: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.
fields.title: The Hangover

fields.plot: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.
fields.title: Lawless

fields.plot: Aliens invade Earth and inadvertently spawn a quartet of mutated reptilian warriors, the Ninja Turtles, who rise up against them to defend the world.
fields.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

fields.plot: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.
fields.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides

fields.plot: An art auctioneer who has become mixed up with a group of criminals partners with a hypnotherapist in order to recover a lost painting.
fields.title: Trance

fields.plot: The true story of Paul Potts, a shy, bullied shop assistant by day and an amateur opera singer by night who became a phenomenon after being chosen for -- and ultimately winning --
fields.title: One Chance

fields.plot: Forced underground by the next ice age, a struggling outpost of survivors must fight to preserve humanity against a threat even more savage than nature.
fields.title: The Colony

fields.plot: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely and interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.
fields.title: Love Actually

fields.plot: As the result of a childhood wish, John Bennett's teddy bear, Ted, came to life and has been by John's side ever since - a friendship that's tested when Lori, John's girlfriend of four years, wants more from their relationship.
fields.title: Ted

fields.plot: The
tale is told from the perspective of the villainous Maleficent and looks at the events that hardened her heart and drove her to curse young Princess Aurora.
fields.title: Maleficent

fields.plot: A teenage girl risks everything when she falls in love with a vampire.
fields.title: Twilight

fields.plot: In a seemingly perfect community, without war, pain, suffering, differences or choice, a young boy is chosen to learn from an elderly man about the true pain and pleasure of the
world.
fields.title: The Giver

fields.plot: A soldier fighting in a war with aliens finds himself caught in a time loop of his last day in the battle, though he becomes better skilled along the way.
fields.title: Edge of Tomorrow

fields.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the universe from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.
fields.title: Star Wars

fields.plot: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.
fields.title: In Time

fields.plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.
fields.title: Batman Begins

fields.plot: The life story of Jackie Robinson and his history-making signing with the Brooklyn Dodgers under the guidance of team executive Branch Rickey.

When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie will risk everything to protect the people she cares most about, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.
fields.title: The Host

fields.plot: A couple with a newborn baby face unexpected difficulties after they are forced to live next to a fraternity house.
fields.title: Neighbors

fields.plot: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire 24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.
fields.title: Into the Wild

fields.plot: A prisoner transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.
fields.title: Pitch Black

fields.plot: Hansel & Gretel are bounty hunters who track and kill witches all over the world. As the fabled Blood Moon approaches, the siblings encounter a new form of evil that might hold a secret to their past.
fields.title: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters

fields.plot: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his father's former partner.
fields.title: The Amazing Spider-Man

fields.plot: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.
fields.title: Sin City

fields.plot: Shy 14-year-old Duncan goes on summer vacation with his mother, her overbearing boyfriend, and her boyfriend's daughter. Having a rough time fitting in, Duncan finds an unexpected friend in Owen, manager of the Water Wizz water park.
fields.title: The Way Way Back

fields.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.
fields.title: The Silence of the Lambs

fields.plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate
Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
fields.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl

fields.plot: A documentary that follows top bodybuilders as they train to compete in the Mr. Olympia competition.
fields.title: Generation Iron

fields.plot: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African-American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.
fields.title: The Help

fields.plot: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
fields.title: Schindler's List

fields.plot: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.
fields.title: No Strings Attached

fields.plot: Set in a post-apocalyptic world, young Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow
for a shot at escape.
fields.title: The Maze Runner

fields.plot: After India's father dies, her Uncle Charlie, who she never knew existed, comes to live with her and her unstable mother. She comes to suspect this mysterious, charming man has ulterior motives and becomes increasingly infatuated with him.
fields.title: Stoker

fields.plot: Based on the failed June 28, 2005 mission
. Four members of SEAL Team 10 were tasked with the mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shahd. Marcus Luttrell was the only member of his team to survive.
fields.title: Lone Survivor

fields.plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.
fields.title: American Pie

fields.plot: Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.
fields.title: Goodfellas

fields.plot: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision corner with his older brother.
fields.title: Warrior

fields.plot: A teenager's dreams come true when a former porn star moves in next door and they fall in love.
fields.title: The Girl Next Door

fields.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
fields.title: The Green Mile

fields.plot: A comedy centered around four couples who settle into a tropical-island resort for a vacation. While one of the couples is there to work on the marriage, the others fail to realize that participation in the resort's therapy sessions is not optional.
fields.title: Couples Retreat

fields.plot: After being deemed unfit for military service, Steve Rogers volunteers for a top secret research project that turns him into Captain America, a superhero dedicated to defending USA ideals.
fields.title: Captain America: The First Avenger

fields.plot: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.
fields.title: Paranoia

fields.plot: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.
fields.title: Jagten

fields.plot: Dude Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.
fields.title: The Big Lebowski

fields.plot: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.
fields.title: Remember the Titans

fields.plot: A classic fairy tale, with swordplay, giants, an evil prince, a beautiful princess, and yes, some kissing (as read by a kindly grandfather).
fields.title: The Princess Bride

fields.plot: Deckard, a blade runner, has to track down and terminate 4 replicants who hijacked a ship in space and have returned to Earth seeking their maker.
fields.title: Blade Runner

fields.plot: Obsessed with [link=tt0112130], a woman travels to a [link=nm0000807] theme park in search for her perfect gentleman.
fields.title: Austenland

fields.plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
fields.title: Jurassic Park

fields.plot: A cocky young man travels to Oregon to work on an apple farm. Out of his element, he finds his lifestyle and notions being picked apart by everyone who crosses his path.
fields.title: C.O.G.

fields.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.
fields.title: Se7en

fields.plot: As he plans his next job, a longtime thief tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to one of his earlier heists, as well as the FBI agent looking to bring him and his crew down.
fields.title: The Town

fields.plot: Los Angeles, 1949: A secret crew of police officers led by two determined sergeants work together in an effort to take down the ruthless mob king Mickey Cohen who runs the city.
fields.title: Gangster Squad

fields.plot: A small town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip, while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.
fields.title: Rock of Ages

fields.plot: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.
fields.title: Zoolander

fields.plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
fields.title: Finding Nemo

fields.plot: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.
fields.title: (500) Days of Summer

fields.plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
fields.title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo.

fields.plot: Set in late-19th-century Russia high-society, the aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the affluent Count Vronsky.
fields.title: Anna Karenina

fields.plot: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.
fields.title: Life of Pi

fields.plot: A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.
fields.title: The Big Wedding

fields.plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
fields.title: The Matrix

fields.plot: Rose Hathaway is a Dhampir, half human/vampire, guardians of the Moroi, peaceful, mortal vampires living discretely within our world. Her legacy is to protect the Moroi from bloodthirsty, immortal Vampires, the Strigoi. This is her story.
fields.title: Vampire Academy

fields.plot: Tony Stark has declared himself Iron Man and installed world peace... or so he thinks. He soon realizes that not only is there a mad man out to kill him with his own technology, but there's something more: he is dying.
fields.title: Iron Man 2

fields.plot: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.
fields.title: Forrest Gump

fields.plot: A thief with a unique code of professional ethics is double-crossed by his crew and left for dead. Assuming a new disguise and forming an unlikely alliance with a woman on the inside, he looks to hijack the score of the crew's latest heist.
fields.title: Parker

fields.plot: 5 years after Pitch Black, the wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.
fields.title: The Chronicles of Riddick

fields.plot: Tricked into thinking he killed his father, a guilt ridden lion cub flees into exile and abandons his identity as the future King.
fields.title: The Lion King

fields.plot: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.
fields.title: Jack Reacher

fields.plot: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.
fields.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo

fields.plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
fields.title: Avatar

fields.plot: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.
fields.title: End of Watch

fields.plot: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.
fields.title: Snow White and the Huntsman

fields.plot: Annabel and Lucas are faced with the challenge of raising his young nieces that were left alone in the forest for 5 years.... but how alone were they?
fields.title: Mama

fields.plot: Pete and Debbie are both about to turn 40, their kids hate each other, both of their businesses are failing, they're on the verge of losing their house, and their relationship is threatening to fall apart.
fields.title: This Is 40

fields.plot: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.
fields.title: Superbad

fields.plot: A modern retelling of Shakespeare's classic comedy about two pairs of lovers with different takes on romance and a way with words.
fields.title: Much Ado About Nothing

fields.plot: Three sixty-something friends take a break from their day-to-day lives to throw a bachelor party in Las Vegas for their last remaining single pal.
fields.title: Last Vegas

fields.plot: A ballet dancer wins the lead in
and is perfect for the role of the delicate White Swan - Princess Odette - but slowly loses her mind as she becomes more and more like Odile, the Black Swan.
fields.title: Black Swan

fields.plot: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.
fields.title: Drive Angry

fields.plot: With dreams of becoming a chef, a culinary genius in the form of a rat, makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famed restaurant.
fields.title: Ratatouille

fields.plot: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.
fields.title: Grown Ups

fields.plot: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.
fields.title: Gladiator

fields.plot: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teen-aged daughter.
fields.title: Hotel Transylvania

fields.plot: Centers on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from purgatory. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.
fields.title: The Lovely Bones

fields.plot: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.
fields.title: Horrible Bosses

fields.plot: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.
fields.title: The Expendables 2

fields.plot: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.
fields.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
